title.rendered: HP 15 (2021) AMD Ryzen 3-3250 8 GB RAM, 1TB HDD + 256GB SSD, 15.6 inches FHD Screen, Windows 10, MS Office Thin & Light Laptop, 1.82kg…

content.rendered:
• Free upgrade to Windows 11 when available* Disclaimer-*The Windows 11 upgrade will be delivered late 2021 into 2022. Timing varies by device. Certain features require specific hardware.
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3250U (2.6 GHz base clock, up to 3.5 GHz max boost clock, 4 MB L3 cache, 2 cores)
  • Operating System & Preinstalled Software: Pre-loaded Windows 10 Home with lifetime validity, FREE Upgrade to Windows 11* (when available, refer product description for more details) | Microsoft Office Home & Student 2019
  • Display: 15.6-inch FHD (1920 x 1080), IPS, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, 45% NTSC
  • Memory & Storage: 8 GB DDR4-2400 SDRAM (1 x 8 GB) | 256 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD + 1TB HDD 5400 RPM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 6 Graphics
